main.se450.interfaces

Interface IDebris

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObservable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebrisPoint, ShieldCircle, ShipLine

    public interface IDebris
extends IObservable
    The Interface IDebris to represents debris objects.
